method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the current list of installed fix packs with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the fix packs URI.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

response.doc: 200 OK Content-Type:application/json [ { "id":1, "name":"Enable_Root_Shell", "action":"Installed", "rollback":"Yes", "desc":"Enable the root shell", "date":"10 Apr 2013 19:26:38" }, { "id":2, "name":"Second fix pack", "action":"Installed", "rollback":"Yes", "desc":"Enable the root shell", "date":"22 Apr 2013 07:26:38" } ]

param.name: Action
param.doc: Indicates if the fixpack is installed or uninstalled.

param.name: rollback
param.doc: Indicates if rollback is possible, ie "Yes".

param.name: date
param.doc: The date the fixpack was installed, ie "10 Apr 2013 19:26:38".
